enumeratedValue.description: Use 1 BP (1/1 duty cycle)
Use 2 BP (1/2 duty cycle)
Use 3 BP (1/3 duty cycle)
Use 4 BP (1/4 duty cycle). (Default)
Use 5 BP (1/5 duty cycle)
Use 6 BP (1/6 duty cycle)
Use 7 BP (1/7 duty cycle)
Use 8 BP (1/8 duty cycle)
Selects the default clock as the LCD clock source
Selects the alternate clock as the LCD clock source
All frontplane and backplane pins are disabled. The LCD controller system is also disabled, and all LCD waveform generation clocks are stopped. VLL3 is connected to VDD internally

LCD controller driver system is enabled, and frontplane and backplane waveforms are generated. All LCD pins, LCD_Pn, enabled using the LCD pin enable register, output an LCD driver waveform.The backplane pins output an LCD driver backplane waveform based on the settings of DUTY[2:0]. Charge pump or resistor bias is enabled

field.name: LCDSTP
field.description: LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator while in Stop mode

enumeratedValue.description: Allows the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator to continue running during Stop mode
Disables the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator when MCU goes into Stop mode

field.name: LCDWAIT
field.description: LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator stop while in Wait mode

enumeratedValue.description: Allows the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator to continue running during Wait mode
Disables the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator when MCU goes into Wait mode
Divide factor = 1 (No divide)
Divide factor = 8

field.name: FDCIEN
field.description: LCD fault detection complete interrupt enable

enumeratedValue.description: No interrupt request is generated by this event
When a fault is detected and FDCF bit is set, this event causes an interrupt request
No interrupt request is generated by this event
When LCDIF bit is set, this event causes an interrupt request
Drive VLL2 internally from VDD
Drive VLL3 internally from VDD
Drive VLL3 externally from VDD or drive VLL1 internally from VIREG
Divide input, VIREG = 1.0 V for 3 V glass
Do not divide the input, VIREG = 1.67 V for 5 V glass

field.name: CPSEL
field.description: Charge pump or resistor bias select

enumeratedValue.description: LCD charge pump is disabled. Resistor network selected. (The internal 1/3-bias is forced.)
LCD charge pump is selected. Resistor network disabled. (The internal 1/3-bias is forced.)
Regulated voltage disabled
Regulated voltage enabled
Display blank during the blink period
Display alternate display during blink period (Ignored if duty is 5 or greater)
Normal or alternate display mode
Blank display mode
Normal display mode
Alternate display mode
Disables blinking
Starts blinking at blinking frequency specified by LCD blink rate calculation
Frame frequency interrupt condition has not occurred
The start of LCD controller frame has occurred
Fault detection for LCD_P0 pin
Fault detection for LCD_P1 pin
Type of the selected pin under fault detect test is frontplane
Type of the selected pin under fault detect test is backplane
Disable fault detection
Enable fault detection
Sample window width is 4 sample clock cycles
Sample window width is 8 sample clock cycles
1/1 bus clock
1/2 bus clock
No "one" samples
1 "one" samples
Fault detection is not completed
Fault detection is completed
LCD operation disabled on LCD_Pn
LCD operation enabled on LCD_Pn
Frontplane operation enabled on LCD_Pn
Backplane operation enabled on LCD_Pn

LCD segment on or LCD backplane active for phase A

LCD segment on or LCD backplane active for phase B

LCD segment on or LCD backplane active for phase C
